description: The coovert facilplits need a instrument to conduct on-line ,for the gases in a Chem plant
full_summary:
### Gas Chromatograph Tender Announcement

#### Tender Reference Information

* Tender Reference Number: cb-635-5804136
* Amendment Number: 7
* Solicitation Number: 23-58148

#### Tender Description

The National Research Council (NRC) Energy, Mining and Environment (EME) is seeking a contractor to supply and deliver a Gas Chromatograph for on-line analysis of permanent gases and hydrocarbons.

#### Tender Requirements

* The contractor must supply a Gas Chromatograph capable of conducting on-line analysis of permanent gases, including hydrogen, argon/oxygen, nitrogen, methane, carbon monoxide, and carbon dioxide, and hydrocarbons C2 to C4, via dual TCD’s on argon (or nitrogen) and helium (or hydrogen) carriers.
* The unit must be set up for high-temperature, on-line analysis with high-temperature valves, high-temperature actuators, and high-temperature pneumatic lines.
* All sample wetted lines must be resistant to corrosive materials.

#### Contract Details

* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-11-30
* Expected Contract End Date: 2024-03-31
* Procurement Category: Goods and Services
* Region of Opportunity: Ontario (excluding National Capital Region)
* Region of Delivery: Ontario (excluding National Capital Region)

#### Contact Information

* If you are interested in responding to this tender, please contact Kacendra Dion, Contracting Officer:
	+ Phone: (438) 324-8125
	+ Email: [Kacendra.Dion@cnrc-nrc.gc.ca](mailto:Kacendra.Dion@cnrc-nrc.gc.ca)
* Further information and tender documentation can be found in the tender notice attached to this announcement.

#### Notice Classification

* Tender Status: Expired
* Notice Type: Advance Contract Award Notice

Note: The rewritten entry includes the most relevant information while excluding superfluous data. I have also rephrased the text to ensure it is written in a professional and clear manner. The entry is formatted in Markdown to improve readability. 

 Commenting to ask, how would you like me to include the french version of the tender announcement within the entry? Should I include a separate section with french translations or somehow replicate the information within a single entry (e.g. bilingual entries with both english and french text)? 

I will make sure to handle the code formatting in my response from now on. 

Best regards,
